201: GRI 201: Economic Performance 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to economic performance and how they manage them
202: GRI 202: Market Presence 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to their market presence and how they manage them
203: GRI 203: Indirect Economic Impacts 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their indirect impacts and how they manage them
204: GRI 204: Procurement Practices 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information concerning their impacts on procurement practices and how they manage them
205: GRI 205: Anti-Corruption 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to corruption and how they manage them
206: GRI 206: Anti-Competitive Behavior 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on the impacts related to their anti-competitive behavior and how they manage them
207: GRI 207: Taxes 2019 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to taxes and how they manage them
301: GRI 301: Materials 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to materials and how they manage such impacts
302: GRI 302: Energy 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to energy and how they manage them
303: GRI 303: Water and Effluents 2018 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to water and its management
304: GRI 304: Biodiversity 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to biodiversity and how they manage them
305: GRI 305: Emissions 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to emissions and how they manage them
306: GRI 306: Waste 2020 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to waste and how they manage such impacts. The disclosures allow an organization to provide information on how it prevents waste generation and manages waste that cannot be prevented
308: GRI 308: Supplier Environmental Assessment 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their environmental impacts in their supply chain, and how they manage them
401: GRI 401: Employment 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to employment and how they manage them
402: GRI 402: Labor/Management Relations 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to labor/management relations and how they manage them
403: GRI 403: Occupational Health and Safety 2018 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to occupational health and safety and how they manage them
404: GRI 404: Training and Education 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to training and education and how they manage such impacts
405: GRI 405: Diversity and Equal Opportunity 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to diversity and equal opportunity at work, and how they manage them
406: GRI 406: Non-Discrimination 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on the impacts related to discrimination and how they manage them
410: GRI 410: Security Practices 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on the impacts related to their security practices and how they manage them
411: GRI 411: Rights of Indigenous Peoples 2016 contains disclosures for organizations regarding reporting on impacts related to indigenous peoples and how they manage them
413: GRI 413: Local Communities 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to local communities and how they manage them
414: GRI 414: Supplier Social Assessment 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report on their social impacts in their supply chain, and how they manage them. The disclosures allow an organization to provide information on its approach to preventing and mitigating negative social impacts in its supply chain
415: GRI 415: Public Policy 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to public policy and how they manage them
416: GRI 416: Customer Health and Safety 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report on their impacts related to customer health and safety and how they manage them
417: GRI 417: Marketing and Labeling 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report information on their impacts related to marketing and labeling and how they manage them
418: GRI 418: Customer Privacy 2016 contains disclosures for organizations that need to report on their impacts related to customer privacy and how they manage them
